typeSystemDescription.name: TyCorTypes
typeSystemDescription.description: Type Coercion type system - assign "lexical types" to expected question answers and candidate answers and allow matching them

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.LAT
typeDescription.description: Lexical Answer Type; e.g. "Who was the first king of Bohemia?" can generate LATs "king"; "Who invented the transistor?" can generate LATs "person" or "inventor". Some LATs are generated from the question itself while others are derived from other LATs/clues.

featureDescription.name: pos
featureDescription.description: The part-of-speech POS tag of this LAT.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The LAT string; this may not be the same as covered text, e.g. an LAT generated from "who" is a "person".

featureDescription.name: synset
featureDescription.description: A WordNet synset ID of the sense that corresponds to this LAT. This can be null if the LAT is not anchored in a wordnet sense.

featureDescription.name: specificity
featureDescription.description: A value determining how specific this is; 0 is most specific and progressive negative numbers indicate reduced specificity; in some equations, this value might be an exponent for exponentially decaying specificity. The idea is that "inventor" may get 0, "creator" -1, "person" -5, "entity" -10 or something like that.

featureDescription.name: baseLAT
featureDescription.description: If this LAT was derived from another, the original LAT.

featureDescription.name: isHierarchical
featureDescription.description: True if this LAT is part of a specificity hierarchy. E.g. LAT generated by focus or evidence match is not, while LAT generated by WordNet or YAGO is. This allows e.g. WordNet specificity matcher to match between WordNet and non-hierarchical LATs, but not between WordNet and YAGO LATs (which would be rather messy).

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.ImplicitQLAT
typeDescription.description: Question LAT generated implicitly (from a question word or another form of focus, e.g. lemmatized).

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.QuestionWordLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from a question word (e.g. when -> LAT time).

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.SVLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from the question SV (selection verb), e.g. SV directed -> LAT director.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.NELAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from named entity type (as provided by the named entity recognizer).

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.DBpWNLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from DBpedia ontology (Wordnet type).

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.QuantityLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from NUM dependency in answer sentence.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.QuantityCDLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from NUM dependency and CD pos in answer sentence.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.WnInstanceLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from Wordnet instance-of relationships.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.DBpOntologyLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from DBpedia curated ontology property name.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.DBpPropertyLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from DBpedia raw infobox property name.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.FBOntologyLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from Freebase curated ontology property name.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.TyCor.WordnetLAT
typeDescription.description: LAT generated from other LATs by Wordnet hypernymy relationships.
